sub_title: Leadership4SDGs, fmr Ambassador /  CEO Cordaid / ED NIMD, UAE Global Council SDG16, NCEA, Pres. UN Assoc. NL, Advisor (women) leadership & governance, advocacy / communication/ speaker / moderator
summary:
Fast thinker, able to connect the dots & come up with new concepts. Always about cooperation & partnership building. Like thinking out of the box. Driving force: tangible results & generating impact. Extensive experience in diverse and complex national / international environments, both in governmental and non-governmental sectors, both in formal positions and as a volunteer. 

Love to work at intersection public-private-non governmental sectors. Believer in social impact & sustainability as co-drivers of future business & sustainable socioeconomic development. Team worker. 

Leadership and learning go together. That's why I developed Leadership4SDGs, to help leaders become their best selves and successfully drive and implement crucial agendas for the common good. 

Working on my book "Saving the ship of humanity. The leadership we need to create the world we want."  

Catch words: 
- Vision. Strategy. Advocacy. Politics and Development related issues. Internationalisation. 
- Women’s rights, gender equality, empowerment, diversity and Inclusion.
- Diplomacy advice. 
- Stakeholder management, Networking, ecosystems build-up. Strategic Partnerships. 
- Philanthropy Development. 
- Corporate & thematic positioning & visibility. 
- Public Speaker. TEDx. Chairperson & facilitator events.

If you just want to keep a ship floating, don't knock on my door. As the saying goes: electric light didn't come from the continuopus improvement of the candle. 

Love team work & fun.

Twitter @SimoneFilippini and @Leadership4SDGs
Instagram @SimoneFilippini912

[{'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Dutch International Commission for Social & Environmental Impact Assessment', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Randstad, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Dutch International Commission for Social & Environmental Impact Assessment', 'description': "In The Netherlands, we have an independent Commission, the NCEA, providing advice on the quality of (the process of) Environmental and Social Impact Assessments - https://www.commissiemer.nl. Chairperson of the Dutch Commission working in The Netherlands, is Mr. Hans Mommaas.

At the request of a government authority, the NCEA can prepare an independent advice on the scope and quality of the information in Environmental and Social Impact Assessment (ESIA) or Strategic Environmental Assessment (SEA). 

As of January 2023, I am the Chairperson of the Dutch International Commission - https://www.eia.nl/en.

The NCEA does not prepare ESIA /SEA reports, nor does it advise on the decision to approve a project. The NCEA's role is to check if an ESIA/SEA offers a solid basis for public debate and political decision making. This can be done in the scoping, review and implementation/monitoring phases of the ESIA/SEA process. All advisory reports are published and available on the NCEA's website.", 'title': 'Chairperson', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Strategy & Leadership4Good', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Strategy & Leadership4Good', 'description': 'Ref. https://www.strategy-leadership4good.com', 'title': 'Consultancy Services', 'employment_type': 'Self-employed'}]}, {'company': {'id': 82481720, 'name': 'Leadership4SDGs', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQEnxYe3NxxHAA/company-logo_400_400/0/1658934259859?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=V_7JbNw7nNC2nFHff3ZtOwQrNoxQofXkKQLLYhyntZ4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/leadership4sdgs/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Leadership4SDGs', 'description': 'Leadership4SDGs is about Leading4Posterity - it aims to work on systematically supporting government political leadership to become their best selves and accelerate achieving #Agenda2030, the Sustainable Development Goals (#SDGs)and the Climate Goals.
